PackageOracle.name: DA_MEMO_TYPE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_MEMO_TYPE
/* Generated on 01-JUL-15 01.12.05.382560000 AM -05:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,memo_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,memo_type_desc IN VARCHAR2
,memo_retain_days IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,memo_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_memo_type;

body.name: DA_MEMO_TYPE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_MEMO_TYPE
/* Generated on 01-JUL-15 01.12.05.402914000 AM -05:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,memo_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,memo_type_desc IN VARCHAR2
,memo_retain_days IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_memo_type.add, parms=' || memo_type_cd || '|' || memo_type_desc || '|' || memo_retain_days || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_memo_type a
(
a.memo_type_cd
,a.memo_type_desc
,a.memo_retain_days
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.memo_type_cd
,add.memo_type_desc
,add.memo_retain_days
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_memo_type.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,memo_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_memo_type.del, parms=' || memo_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_memo_type a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.memo_type_cd = del.memo_type_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_memo_type.del');

END del;

END da_memo_type;
